channel.title: Npc auto attack
channel.description:
Hai, i was wondering how to make npcs auto attack the closest player within a certain area..
I've seen on like 1 server, where abyssal leeches auto attack you, and keep following until you are out of that area.
Can someone show me how this would look :|? I have no idea.
